name: Furries
startIntroPart2: You could have chosen a normal nation. Why must you choose the path of perpetual torment?
attacked: As a wise man once said, if a fuwwy can affowd a 1000% dowwaw fuwsuit, they can affowd a 10$ pipe bomb in youw maiwbox.
defeated: Congratulations! You did the right thing and destroyed the worst nation in this mod!
introduction: Hewwo, I am Fwoofwes, lowd of cwinge uwu.
afterPeace: You get the sinking feeling you made the wrong choice.
uniqueText: Furries are the masters of cringe. Every city starts with a shrine, making this garbage civ overpowered for religion. If that isn't already enough, they get a stupidly powerful wonder in the Industrial era that almost ensures religion spreads like wildfire. Horrifically unbalanced, but what did you expect from a joke mod?
